headline: Cirtec Medical Announces Appointment of New Chief Executive Officer
summary: BROOKLYN PARK, Minn., Aug. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cirtec Medical, a leading strategic outsourcing partner for complex minimally invasive, active implantable devices and precision components, is pleased to announce the appointment of Shar Matin as Chief Executive Officer, effective September 2, 2025. Shar brings more than 25 years of global leadership experience in the medical technology sector, with a proven track record of scaling businesses, driving innovation, and building strong custom

headline: 2 Reasons to Watch ABT and 1 to Stay Cautious
summary: Abbott Laboratories currently trades at $131.61 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 4.6%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 8.8% gain during that period.

content.title: 2 Reasons to Watch ABT and 1 to Stay Cautious
content.summary: Abbott Laboratories currently trades at $131.61 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 4.6%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 8.8% gain during that period.
